Software Share

Collab-Hub

Collab-Hub is a tool that helps artists, musicians, circuit-benders, game developers, and creative coders share data effortlessly between remote systems and collaborators (or on the same local network).

The Max client is available through Max's built-in package manager.

The P5 library is available here.

Cereal Library

The Cereal Arduino library and accompanying demo patches were created to help simplify serial communication with Max and Pure Data (Pd) for beginners, especially when using multiple sensors.

Simple RNBO Web Template

This repository includes a bare minimum “single oscillator with frequency and volume controls” example for Max's RNBO Web Export.
